Roch Systems - Reston, VA - 100% REMOTE - Full Stack AngularJS,Node.js,Elastic Search

We need two(2) full stack developers (mostly Angular.js, Node.js, and Elastic Search) to work with us on a full-time(40 hours/week) project basis between 6 and 12 months, starting ASAP.
